page.title: 16RECREATION - LEISURE
page.content: In the villages of Elham and Lyminge there are many clubs and societies reflecting the wide interest in Leisure.In both villages the age groups freely mix. Lyminge has an active Judo club, catering mainly for 11-16 year olds. The youth club has a membership of 66. There are two Cub packs and Scout groups in Lyminge as well as Brownies. In Elham the youth of the village enjoys Brownies, Cubs, Guides and Scouts, plus a youth club. The tennis courts are well used.There are cricket clubs in both villages. Families travel to Folkestone, Hythe and Canterbury for bowls, swimming and skiing. There are swings, slides, climbing frames and a round-about in the recreation ground.
